message.entry: Files input must be a character vector or a cell array of non empty character vectors.
The IncludeSubfolders option must be a logical 1 (true) or logical 0 (false).
IRI scheme for path: ''{0}'' is unsupported.
Folder ''{0}'' does not have any files or is empty.\n\nUse ''IncludeSubfolders'' to include files in all subfolders.
Folder ''{0}'' does not have any files or is empty.
Cannot find files or folders matching: ''{0}''.
Failure occurred while trying to resolve path ''{0}''.
{0} must be a character vector or a cell array of character vectors.
{0} cannot contain an empty character vector.
Wildcard ''*'' characters must not be used with IncludeSubfolders:''{0}''\n\nRemove wildcard ''*'' characters or do not set ''IncludeSubfolders'' option.
